co.poynt.os.util

Class TLSv1_2_SSLSocketFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.net.SocketFactory
      • javax.net.ssl.SSLSocketFactory
        • co.poynt.os.util.TLSv1_2_SSLSocketFactory

  • public class TLSv1_2_SSLSocketFactory
extends javax.net.ssl.SSLSocketFactory
    A wrapper SSLSocketFactory that forces every SSLSocket that is created from this factory to have TLSv1.2 enabled. Created by vchau on 8/30/15.
